title: Topics
formTopicErrorMaxLength: Please enter a maximum of {{max}} characters
formTopicNameErrorDuplicate: A topic with the same name already exists
formTopicErrorReplicationMin: Must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
formTopicErrorReplicationMax: The number of replicas cannot exceed the number of nodes in the service ({{max}})

addTopicDescription: Create a new Kafka topic to manage data streams between services.
addTopicToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred adding your topic
deleteTopicToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred deleting your topic

formTopicErrorPattern: Must contain 1 to 249 alphanumeric characters, dashes (-), underscores (_) or full stops (.) only
